## Image 10: Three Different Patterns from Orange

**Title/Description**: Example showing three valid games from "orange" - colors, fruits, round objects

This image should illustrate how from the same starting point "оранжевый" (orange), three different game patterns can emerge:
1. Colors: оранжевый → синий → желтый (orange → blue → yellow)
2. Fruits: оранжевый → ананас → яблоко (orange → pineapple → apple)
3. Round objects: оранжевый → бейсбольный мяч → глобус (orange → baseball → globe)

The key concept is that "ИГРА" (Game) has a wordplay meaning in Russian - it means both the improv concept "Game" and also "game/play" as an activity. So "ИГРА: Цвета" uses this wordplay where we're playing a game with colors, and "ИГРА" refers to both meanings. This wordplay must work in Russian context.
